required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: T Central Memory Cells in Early Localized Non-Segmental Vitiligo
clinical_study.official_title: T Central Memory Cells in Early Localized Non-Segmental Vitiligo and the Effect of Treatment

brief_summary.textblock: Assessing the level of circulating TCMs (cluster of differentiation (CD) 8+, CD3+,C- chemokine receptor (CCR)7, cluster of differentiation 45 receptor (CD45R) cells) in early localized vitiligo cases prior to treatment and after treatment in comparison to healthy controls. This, in turn, would provide insights regarding the role of TCMs in vitiligo and the role of early treatment in halting disease progression and autoimmune memory formation that accounts for high recurrence rate of vitiligo

detailed_description.textblock: Assessing the level of circulating TCMs (CD8+ CD3+ CCR7+ CD45RO+ cells) in early localized vitiligo cases where samples will be processed and stained for CD8, CD3, CCR7, . CCR7, CD45R. Multi-parametric flow cytometry will be used to quantify CD3+ve, CD8+ve, CCR7+ve, CD45RO+ve TCM cells percentage, which will be expressed as a percentage from the total lymphocyte gate. This will be done prior to treatment and after treatment and will be compared to healthy controls.

primary_outcome.measure: comparing level of circulating central memory T cells (TCM) in early localized vitiligo cases to healthy controls
primary_outcome.description: comparing TCM levels in early localized vitiligo cases prior to and after treatment to healthy controls

primary_outcome.measure: percent change in the level of circulating central memory T cells (TCM) in early localized vitiligo cases after treatment
primary_outcome.description: assessing the level of circulating central memory T cells (TCM) in early localized vitiligo cases after treatment and calculating percent change in their levels

primary_outcome.measure: comparing percent change in the level of circulating central memory T cells (TCM) in early localized vitiligo cases after treatment in those receiving systemic treatment to those receiving only topical treatment
primary_outcome.description: assessing the level of circulating central memory T cells (TCM) in early localized vitiligo cases after treatment and calculating percent change in their levels in those receiving systemic treatment to those receiving only topical treatment

arm_group.arm_group_label: Early localized vitiligo on topical treatment
arm_group.description: Cases will only receive topical steroids/ calcineurin inhibitors and targeted phototherapy

arm_group.arm_group_label: Early localized vitiligo on topical and systemic treatment
arm_group.description: Cases will receive oral mini-pulse steroids, topical steroids/ calcineurin inhibitors and targeted phototherapy

intervention.arm_group_label: Early localized vitiligo on topical and systemic treatment

intervention.description: topical fluticasone cream for body lesions and topical tacrolimus for face lesions
intervention.arm_group_label: Early localized vitiligo on topical and systemic treatment
Early localized vitiligo on topical treatment

intervention.description: twice weekly targeted excimer light sessions
intervention.arm_group_label: Early localized vitiligo on topical and systemic treatment
Early localized vitiligo on topical treatment

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with vitiligo localized to one anatomical area, of â‰¤ 6 months' duration
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who received treatment of any type (topical or systemic) within the last 3 months

facility.name: Cairo university hospitals, dermatology outpatient clinic

patient_data.ipd_description: Participants' data that underlie reported results will be shared upon request, after deidentification
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Beginning 3 months and ending 12 months after article publication
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Controlled Access: Researchers who provide a methodologically sound proposal will be allowed to access data to achieve aims in the approved proposal
